data.message: Does anybody monitor this Facebook page?  I have been private messaging you guys for two days now and no response?

replies.message: Hi Jon. This is a great place to ask questions. How can we help? -Brittany

I am having a problem logging into my Facebook account on my computer.  I am able to log into it on my cell phone but not my computer.  I also have two Facebook accounts and i would like to delete one of them the one Jon Weiland formerly know as Steve williams the one that has no friends and no profile picture.

Hey Jon. If you're having trouble logging in, here are a few things to try: http://bit.ly/2pUpwfK. You can request to have your old Facebook account permanently deleted. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2pUDfn4. Keep in mind it's against Facebook Community Standards to maintain more than one personal profile. -Brittany

I am still 
Not able to log into my primary Facebook account on my computer.
